author: The Telegraph
title: How to buy and sell funds on Telegraph Investor
text: Login to your account here 1. Select “Trade Now” in the navigation bar 2. In the sub-navigation bar select “Funds” 3. Type in the fund required and select from the drop-down menu Select the account (Trading Account / ISA) Buy or Sell and the value that you want to invest 4. Confirm that you have read the key features document and then your fund trade will be confirmed. Please note that when trading funds the transaction will not show in your “My Holdings” or “Trading History” tabs until the next working day. However in your “Overview” tab the “Available to Invest” amount will be adjusted straight away. For help with buying & selling Funds & Shares call us on 0845 200 3637 : we’re here from 7.45am to 9pm, Monday to Friday, and we’ll be glad to help. Please be aware of the risks involved. The value of investments, and any income from them, can fall as well as rise so you could get back less than you invest. Past performance is no guarantee of future performance. Tax treatment depends on your individual circumstances and may be subject to change. If in any doubt, please seek advice.
